Description:
Enhanced Airflow: Designed with intake air vents for superior cooling performance, ensuring optimal airflow throughout your system.
RGB Lighting: Equipped with 5x static RGB color 120mm fans—2 on the top, 2 on the bottom, and 1 in the rear—adding vibrant lighting to your build.

Compact Yet Powerful: Compact size ATX case that accommodates full-sized components, including GPUs up to 340mm in length.
Versatile Configuration: Perfect for gamers and PC enthusiasts looking for a balance between performance and aesthetics.
Stunning 270° Panoramic View: Showcase your components from all angles with three-sided tempered glass panels, giving you a full, unobstructed view of your build.
Label: Chasis Raidmax I802 Black
